titleStmt.title: Remember Lots wife Two godly and fruitfull sermons verie conuenient for this our time: lately preached on a Sunday in the Cathedral Church of S. Peters, in Excester: the one, in the forenoone: the other, in the afternoone the same day. By Iohn C.
titleStmt.author: Carpenter, John, d. 1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Orwin, and are to be solde by Edward White at the litle North-doore of S. Paules, at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Two godly sermons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the litle North-doore of S. Paules, at the signe of the Gunne
